summary: Firewood is now for sale at Belethor\'s in Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
Update 1.1

Note: I created a separate leveled list
ID entry for Firewood just in Belethor\'s 
chest. It should not conflict with anything else,
unless you have a mod installed that effects all
common vendors. These mods can be intrusive, as their
changes can supersede all common vendors lists.
It should be as low in the mod list as possible.

Update 1.1 brings it in line with 1.4 patch

Read Me: Firewood For Sale V1
*********************************
If like me, you are an Archer,
you probably have a pain in 
your face from chopping wood
to make arrows. Well the pain 
has now moved from the face to 
the purse. Belethor, the skinflint 
of Whiterun, is selling Firewood
for... a profit. He will have
40 in stock every few days.
*********************************
I would advise sleeping for 
several days, the first time you
load the mod, just to give him
time to flog his man servant
into a chopping frenzy for all
your Fletching needs.
*********************************
Installation:
Put it in the data folder with
all the rest and make sure it
is checked. To uninstall, reverse
the process.
*********************************
DISCLAIMER: 
Use at your own risk! There is no
CK yet so, when we mod, it is with
copious amounts of caffeine, beer,
pizza, fried skeever and seat of the
pants logic/guess work. So if something
goes wrong, blame the diet not me!

It should be fine have fun.
author: bladerunner1971
